text: Imperfections are always there, but the booster is when you accept that you are beautiful the way you are....
author: Meenakshi

text: The INSTINCT to become better everyday, Leads the vision to be the best...
author: Meenakshi

text: Never miss a chance to learn, For never get a chance to regret.
author: Meenakshi

text: CONSISTENCY in WINNING may blend you egoistically, but CONSISTENCY in EFFORTS will put an end to fear of losing...
author: Meenakshi

text: Show loyalty to your efforts, then success can't betray you.
author: Meenakshi

text: First huddle can be laborious, but once you get momentum even the highest ones are a cinch.
author: Meenakshi

text: If you cheat now, you may pass. But remember, Life always confronts you with different test papers.
author: Meenakshi

text: Work Hard to see the change, What you are today, What you will be tomorrow...
author: Meenakshi

text: WELL DONE is better than WELL SAID!
author: Meenakshi

text: Don't give up on something, you really want. It's difficult to want but worst to regret....
author: Meenakshi

text: Work Hard to be capable, not only to crown success
author: Meenakshi

text: Today is hard, Tomorrow is harder, Day after Tomorrow is beautiful. But most of the people die Tomorrow Evening...
If you are comfortable in your life then you can't grow.
Don't miss it, either Grab it or Never think of it again.
author: Meenakshi

text: Leave the anxiety you have, grab the confidence you built
author: Meenakshi

text: To start, you only need courage, not a date or time
author: Meenakshi
